__e: They really are beautiful, and I'm just so proud of you.
You have a pretty mouth, beautiful eyes and a really dainty figure.
He's a good man and the two of you will have many splendid, healthy children together.
And being with you tonight and looking into those big, beautiful eyes makes me realize how much...
Because I can see all that and a lot more in those gorgeous blue eyes.
From the moment we met and I saw who you are behind those ridiculously beautiful blue eyes, I knew you were the one.
I was watching the love of my life take our beautiful children to school and all I could think about was what I was still missing.
Outside of my husband and my two beautiful children... you are the most important person in the world to me.
This ain't fair to you or those beautiful kids of yours.
